analysis: The project appears to be a static website with multiple versions (test-website, github-page, docs). The event specifies a theme related to 'blackholes' with animated objects and slides. The current UI files (CSS, TSX components) need to be updated to reflect a space/blackhole theme with animations.

Add animated elements such as rotating planets, twinkling stars, and a central blackhole graphic to enhance the theme.
Implement JavaScript animations for the blackhole theme, including smooth transitions for animated objects and slides.
Apply the same space-themed color palette and animations to the GitHub Pages version of the website.
Update the documentation site with the blackhole theme, including dark backgrounds and animated space elements.
